title: 1sajjjad9
author: 1sajjjad9
created_time: March 23, 2023, 05:00:36 PMLast edit: March 24, 2023, 04:21:39 PM by 1sajjjad9
content: Hi all! I want to tell you about my unpleasant situation on Duckdice.io, I thought support would answer by mail, but they are not going to answer me at all and the chat was turned off when I wrote to it with a request to unblock my account.My nickname in DuckDice is 1sajjad9My E mail: usama_syed96@hotmail.comWhat happened:: Made a deposit on the 1 of March 499.2 usdt to the TRC20 wallet - 0x4d2b0349c14e18d176ae6ae753b6d8e743b46b1b584845b67403c902bdd67cefAnd also the second deposit after 8 hours, also on March 1, in the amount of 529.2 usdt to the TRC20 wallet - 0xa11f30a278479b845cb88bca3fc9554fe62ac14fee25ef2df44287eff76aa2a2I made up to 10 bets since my balance was just over ~$2520 and I decided to withdraw some of it. Withdrawal canceled, comment written: canceled due to KYC administrator, and on the side they wrote that I must pass level 2 verification.A couple of days later I write to the chat, they open an account for me for a day. I pass verification to level 2, write to the chat, put my funds for withdrawal - they don’t withdraw, they write to go through level 3, although initially they didn’t ask for it at all. I upload original bank statements that match the address in my profile and my statements in a row just get rejected and my account closes again. Why? For what? They don’t answer the mail, I’m tired of waiting and I’m writing this topic.Open my account for me and return all my balance to mesupport@duckdice.io @DuckDice.ioUPDATE:: : Funds returned in full, handsome guys, thank you all!

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: First of all please remove the non-English text as you have removed a few earlier. I think they found something wrong with you that's why they are behaving like this. You should try to continue contact with them. ANd also you can contact their forum account "DuckDice.io" Please do not go away. Try to update as much information as possible here.

comments.author: Saisher
comments.body: Quote from: 1sajjjad9 on March 23, 2023, 05:00:36 PMA couple of days later I write to the chat, they open an account for me for a day. I pass verification to level 2, write to the chat, put my funds for withdrawal - they don’t withdraw, they write to go through level 3, although initially they didn’t ask for it at all. I upload original bank statements that match the address in my profile and my statements in a row just get rejected and my account closes again. Why? For what? They don’t answer the mail, I’m tired of waiting and I’m writing this topic.Open my account for me and return all my balance to mesupport@duckdice.io @DuckDice.ioYou did the right thing posting your issue here since they have an announcement here and the representative is still active here, you can PM the representative and point this discussion, so you can get answers on why they blocked your account if its only KYC issues, usually casinos will tell you right away about your violation and the rule they break but never about KYC verification.Checking the representative account there is bad feedback, one of it as early as 2017, and also there are many flags on that account but I hope your chances are good compared to the other.

comments.author: shasan
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on March 23, 2023, 09:25:24 PMusually casinos will tell you right away about your violation and the rule they break but never about KYC verification.If the gambling site thinks/suspect the user might have multiple accounts and abuse them then they can ask for KYC verification. If the user fails to do that then they won't release the fund a lock also if they wish then they may release only the deposit funds even if they can take a service fee from the deposit funds.

comments.author: coupable
comments.body: Quote from: Saisher on March 23, 2023, 09:25:24 PMusually casinos will tell you right away about your violation and the rule they break but never about KYC verification.But this may raise other problems. Since the site does not impose identity verification procedures, users will choose it because they want to preserve their privacy.Let's imagine that two or more people are using the gambling platform using the same network, such as that they are using a public Wi-Fi network or even the same device if, for example, they are brothers using one computer in their home. The site can simply suspect that these accounts are owned by one person and the verification process will force those users seeking privacy to submit to the terms of the platform.On the other hand, a platform that does not verify the identities of users will open the door for minor children to practice gambling, which is a very dangerous matter, as we know .

comments.body: Quote from: 1sajjjad9 on March 23, 2023, 05:00:36 PMsnipMade a deposit on the 1 of March 499.2 usdt to the TRC20 wallet - 0x4d2b0349c14e18d176ae6ae753b6d8e743b46b1b584845b67403c902bdd67cefI made up to 10 bets since my balance was just over ~$2520 and I decided to withdraw some of it. Withdrawal canceled, comment written: canceled due to KYC administrator, and on the side they wrote that I must pass level 2 verification.A couple of days later I write to the chat, they open an account for me for a day. I pass verification to level 2, write to the chat, put my funds for withdrawal - they don’t withdraw, they write to go through level 3, although initially they didn’t ask for it at all. I upload original bank statements that match the address in my profile and my statements in a row just get rejected and my account closes again. Why? For what? They don’t answer the mail, I’m tired of waiting and I’m writing this topic.hi OP, i was saddened by the problem your account is having at duckdice, are you used to playing there because i see that the nominal deposit you entered is quite large, and from the story you told, it seems they won't let you make withdrawals easily because it doesn't make sense if you are required to complete KYC up to level 3. you should fight for your rights although i'm not sure if your problem will be solved in the near future, it seems the OP from duckdice is online quite often in this forum, hope there is a good response from them.

comments.author: Kirito89
comments.created_time: March 24, 2023, 06:54:04 AMLast edit: March 24, 2023, 11:00:23 AM by Kirito89
comments.body: Quote from: 1sajjjad9 on March 23, 2023, 05:00:36 PMHi all! I want to tell you about my unpleasant situation on Duckdice.io, I thought support would answer by mail, but they are not going to answer me at all and the chat was turned off when I wrote to it with a request to unblock my account.My nickname in DuckDice is 1sajjad9My E mail: usama_syed96@hotmail.comЧтo пpoизoшлo:: Made a deposit on the 1 of March 499.2 usdt to the TRC20 wallet - 0x4d2b0349c14e18d176ae6ae753b6d8e743b46b1b584845b67403c902bdd67cefI made up to 10 bets since my balance was just over ~$2520 and I decided to withdraw some of it. Withdrawal canceled, comment written: canceled due to KYC administrator, and on the side they wrote that I must pass level 2 verification.A couple of days later I write to the chat, they open an account for me for a day. I pass verification to level 2, write to the chat, put my funds for withdrawal - they don’t withdraw, they write to go through level 3, although initially they didn’t ask for it at all. I upload original bank statements that match the address in my profile and my statements in a row just get rejected and my account closes again. Why? For what? They don’t answer the mail, I’m tired of waiting and I’m writing this topic.Open my account for me and return all my balance to mesupport@duckdice.io @DuckDice.ioHello, the reason why your account is currently blocked is because you've been flagged as an arbitrage bettor by the sports provider.Then you were asked to proceed in passing KYC which was failed (blocked by the compliance authority), all 3 levels of it thus resulting your account in continuing being blocked for further investigations.I would like to add that we as Duckdice don't handle the KYC procedures ourselves, and it's done via SumSub which is basically one of the global leading  KYC/AML compliance ecosystem. For example Binance's KYC/AML procedures are done via SumSub.I am currently waiting on more information regarding your case and will get back to you here once I have them.Kirito89,Duckdice Support.Edit : UpdateYou have received your balance in full, please do not proceed in oppening any new accounts with Duckdice.

comments.author: aioc
comments.body: Quote from: Kirito89 on March 24, 2023, 06:54:04 AMYou have received your balance in full, please do not proceed in oppening any new accounts with Duckdice.OP Please confirm if you receive the balance in full since the representative did post the transaction id, it's the third party that blocked your account, and it is also the sports provider that marked your account as arbitrage bettor so the blame cannot be on Duckdice.You're still lucky because other casinos will just keep your balance, Duckdice instead returns your balance if you think that you have been wrongly accused you can file for mediation with a third party, Askgamblers can be requested to mediate your case, but since it is the provider who marked it, your chances are low.

comments.author: 1sajjjad9
comments.body: I received the money today in full, thanks a lot to the team Duckdice and separately @Kirito89

comments.author: coin-investor
comments.body: Quote from: 1sajjjad9 on March 24, 2023, 11:47:08 AMI received the money today in full, thanks a lot to the team Duckdice and separately @Kirito89Since you received the balance in full and have thanked the Duckdice team it's about time that you change the title of this thread to resolve if you are satisfied with their action and also locked this thread.Kudos to the Duckdice team for addressing this concern in a timely manner.
